Html:
Hello guys,

I'm trying to create a small m:ui app, and I need some controls from Telerik.
Is there any way to achieve this, using the latest version of m:ui (1.0.5)?

There is previous discussion thread related to this. for version 1.0.2, but I was not able yet to make that work. Anyway, I would like to use the latest release.

Any kind of help will be appreciated!
Cheers!

All I had to do was install Telerik on my computer and include the references I needed in my project

I am using a radgridview and some buttons so far.

Can you show me what you treid to do so far?
